params._anchorAddress: The address of OracleRelay to use as anchor
params._mainAddress: The address of OracleRelay to use as main
params._widthDenominator: The denominator of the allowable deviation width for the stale price
params._widthNumerator: The numerator of the allowable deviation width for the stale price

currentValue().details: Most oracles don't require a state change for pricing, for those who do, override this function

peekValue().details: some oracles require a state change to get the exact current price.      This is updated when calling other state changing functions that query the price

anchorRelay().notice: The interface of the anchor relay

constructor.notice: All values set at construction time

mainRelay().notice: The interface of the main relay

peekValue().notice: returns the price with 18 decimals without any state changes

staleWidthDenominator().notice: The denominator of the allowable deviation from the anchor price for the stale price

staleWidthNumerator().notice: The numerator of the allowable deviation from the anchor price for the stale price

widthDenominator().notice: The denominator of the allowable deviation from the anchor price

widthNumerator().notice: The numerator of the allowable deviation from the anchor price

statements.documentation: Ensure the two relays have the same underlying
If the price is stale the range percentage is smaller
